column2: Hunched and ungroomed; sac'd due to ulcerated tumor.
Brain, heart, lungs, kidney, spleen, liver, tumor
Hunched and ungroomed; sac'd due to ulcerated tumor.
Tumor was fluid-filled; only about 1/2 of presented size was actual tumor tissue.
Brain and skull were in tact.
Heart was enlarged; spleen was smaller than normal.
2 cryogenics and 1 cell line attempted for tumor.
